communications.subject: Freedom of Information Act Request: NARA 9.7.23
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

You are receiving this correspondence as a request under the Freedom of Information Act, 5 U.S.C. subsection 552. I am requesting the following:

Access to a file unit contained in the Records of the Office of the Secretary of the Air Force. This information was initially requested during a visit to the National Archives and Records Administrations' Textual Archives at College Park, Maryland, but access was denied at that time and it was explained by NARA staff that a FOIA request would be required. Pull information for this request is as follows:

Record Group: 340
Series: General Decimal Files, 1955-1955
File Unit: 352 [Army Service and Technical Schools, Staff Colleges, and Troop Schools]
Entry: UD 1-D
NAID: 26422156
Box/Container: 135
Location: 131 A 022/055/02

I look forward to your response within 20 working days, as the statute requires. If access to the records I am requesting will take longer, please advise of which tier of processing queue this request falls under and an estimated time frame for processing.

If you deny any or all of this request, please cite each specific exemption you feel justifies the refusal to release the information and notify me of the appeal procedures available to me under the law.

Sincerely,
Robert Skvarla, Jr.
